body: thank you very much, Mostapha! using a simpler geometry in the attached file, it seems the Decompose By Type component can accept a list of thermal zone as input and it works fine. I assume it is geometry I was using in the last file that is causing the problem. But I don't know why and how to correct it. Hope you can kindly advise by trying the file I attached. Thanks a lot!
